full_summary:
### E6MON-210001 - Request for Standing Offer for Kitchen Products

#### Information

* **Reference Number :** WS3709209288 - Doc #3711903970
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3709209288
* **Publication Date ＼:**: October 17, 2022
* **Bid Closing Date:** November 4, 2022, at 2 PM EDT
* **Contract Expiration:** June 16, 2023

#### Category and Specifications

* **Category:** Goods
* **UNSPSC Codes:**
  * 48101800 - Cookware and kitchen tools
  * 52150000 - Domestic kitchenware and kitchen supplies
  * 52152000 - Domestic dishes and servingware and storage containers
  * 52152100 -  Domestic drink ware

#### Trade Agreements

* This Bid is open to organizations that are able to take advantage of one or more of the following trade agreements:
  * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  * Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
  * World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
  And 12 More...

#### Tender Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) to provide kitchen products on an "as and when ordered" basis. Interested suppliers must submit their bid by the deadline of this notice. Any bids received after this date will be declared non-responsive.

#### Contact Information

.bid inquiries, please contact Corine Lavoie (SPAC/PSPC):
Corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
